extension.description: HDHomeRun DVR frontend. Supports streaming Live TV, Recordings, Electronic Program Guide (EPG) and Timers. Requires a SiliconDust HDHomeRun DVR Service subscription (https://www.silicondust.com/dvr-service) and an active HDHomeRun RECORD device on the local network.
extension.news:
v1.0.2 - Add option to enable discovery of extended (8 hour) Electronic Program Guide data - Update SQLite database engine to v3.17.0
v1.0.1 - Fix minor problem with one database table not being truncated at startup - (Linux) Use older GNU C++ Compiler (g++ 4.9) for better system compatibility
v1.0.0 - Initial release
